content: this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern on my blog www theturtletrunk com the farmhouse coaster features a beautiful ridged texture that s eye catching and modern make in solid colors two tone or a mix of both this pattern is beginner friendly and is a great stash buster as it uses so little yarn finished size 4 5 x 4 5 can easily be adjusted pattern includes -detailed instructions for a solid colored or two tone coaster -photos for reference -link to free video tutorial -gauge difficulty easy supplies needed medium 4 weight cotton yarn 5 00mm h hook yarn needle scissors standard us crochet terms
